channel.title: Converted and killed on the same night
channel.description: #### What happened? I got converted the same night i died from poison This made no sense for me to lose a game when I was BD all the game, and didnt even play a second as cult. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Two options: 1. show everybody that I was cult but count me as BD in the end of the game 2. Keep people who died the same night they were converted as BD
